title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, November 4, 2013
byline: Bruce Johnson, Mark Garrison, Mitchell Hartman, Rahul Tandon, Nick Batzdorf, David Brancaccio and Sabri Ben-Achour
teaser: India tries its hand at interplanetary exploration as the country prepares to launch its first unmanned Mars orbiter. The World Retail Congress Africa started today in Johannesburg, South Africa. Some of the world's most famous companies are there trying to figure out how to sell to the continent -- a fast-growing, but often tough market. And, just what is professional wrestling anyway? Sport? Theater? Farce? Marketplace Morning Report talked to a journalist who finds out in his new book.
